title: Understanding Car Leasing vs. Paying Down Your Mortgage
subtitle: Explore the financial implications of leasing vs. investing in mortgage reduction, including saving thousands and environmental considerations.
content:
Dad, can I lease this new car for $250 a month? No.

Why not? You have the money. Yes, I do. I'm going to use that money to pay down our mortgage early.

How much does that save you?

If I put an additional $250 a month towards the principal, I will save about $50,000 and take seven years off the mortgage.

What will I drive? I heard e-bikes are very popular these days and good for the environment.

And where did you learn this?

Just follow Social Cap. He makes complex finance seem easy.
